alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:51PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Newton and northern Johnson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 351 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Devils Knob, or 13 miles north of Clarksville, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillen... Walnut... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Salus... Catalpa... Harmony... Fort Douglas... Yale... Friley... Ozone... Fallsville... Haw Creek Falls Campground... Deer... Oark... Dixon Ridge... Hunt... Nail... Wolf Pen Campground... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
